程序包 com.lovo.netCRM.component

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    LovoAccordion
    一个类似于QQ主界面的手风琴组件
    示例:
    public class CityBean { private int id; //城市id private String cityName; //城市名称 private List schoolList = new ArrayList();//城市中包含学校集合 …… } public class SchoolBean { private int id;//学校id private String schoolName;//学校名称 …… public String toString(){//重写toString，返回列表框显示内容 return this.schoolName; } } List cityList = new ArrayList(); CityBean c1 = new CityBean(1,"成都市"); CityBean c2 = new CityBean(2,"绵阳市"); CityBean c3 = new CityBean(3,"乐山市"); c1.getSchoolList().add(new SchoolBean(1,"成都外国语学校")); c1.getSchoolList().add(new SchoolBean(2,"成都十二中")); c2.getSchoolList().add(new SchoolBean(3,"绵阳外国语学校")); c2.getSchoolList().add(new SchoolBean(4,"绵阳中学")); c3.getSchoolList().add(new SchoolBean(5,"乐山外国语学校")); c3.getSchoolList().add(new SchoolBean(6,"乐山第一中学")); cityList.add(c1); cityList.add(c2); cityList.add(c3); //创建手风琴组件 LovoAccordion ac = new LovoAccordion(this,cityList,"schoolList"){ public void clickEvent(Object obj) { SchoolBean bean = (SchoolBean)obj; System.out.println(bean.getId()+" "+bean.getSchoolName()); } }; //设置大小和位置 ac.setBounds(20, 300, 100, 200);
    LovoButton
    按钮组件
    示例:
    LovoButton lbadd = new LovoButton("确定",50,250,this);
    LovoCheckBox
    创建一组复选框组件
    示例： LovoCheckBox lc = new LovoCheckBox("权限",new String[]{"查询","添加","删除","修改"},50,100,this); String[] items = lc.getItem();//得到选中项集合 "是","是","是","否" String[] strs = new String[]{"是","是","否","否"}; lc.setItem(strs);
    LovoComboBox<T>
    下拉框组件
    示例：
    字符串下拉框 LovoComboBox eduTxt = new LovoComboBox("文化程度",new String[]{"高中","大专","本科","硕士"},320,100,this); String edu = eduTxt.getItem();//得到选项 combox.setItem("大专"); 对象下拉框 public class ManBean { private int id; private String userName; private String sex; private Date birthday; …… public String toString(){ return this.userName; } } List list = new ArrayList(); list.add(new ManBean(1,"张三","男",Date.valueOf("1988-02-02"))); list.add(new ManBean(2,"李四","女",Date.valueOf("1990-12-12"))); list.add(new ManBean(3,"王五","男",Date.valueOf("1993-09-09"))); list.add(new ManBean(4,"王六加二","女",Date.valueOf("1987-11-02"))); LovoComboBox combox = new LovoComboBox("员工",list,50,50,this); 添加选项发生变化事件 LovoComboBox combox = new LovoComboBox("员工",list,50,50,this){ public void onchange(Object t) { ManBean bean = (ManBean)t; } }; 得到选项 ManBean man = combox.getItem(); //设置选项 combox.setItem(3,"ids");
    LovoCutPage
    分页组件 LovoCutPage c = new LovoCutPage(30, 100, this){ //点击页码事件
    LovoDate
    日历组件
    示例：
    LovoDate date = new LovoDate("生日",50,200,this); String dateTxt = date.getText();//得到日历字符串
    LovoFileChooser
    文件选择器
    示例：
    LovoFileChooser fc = new LovoFileChooser(this); String path = fc.getFilePath();//得到选择文件路径
    LovoImageLabel
    图片标签
    示例：
    LovoImageLabel faceLabel = new LovoImageLabel(580, 70, 100, 130,this); faceLabel.setImage("1.jpg"); LovoImageLabel faceLabel = new LovoImageLabel(580, 70, 100, 130,this,"1.jpg");
    LovoLabel
    标签组件
    示例：
    LovoLabel nameLabel = new LovoLabel("姓名",40,300,this); String txt = nameLabel.getText();//得到标签文本 nameLabel.setText("");//设置标签文本 LovoLabel nameLabel = new LovoLabel("姓名","张三",40,300,this); String txt = nameLabel.getText();//得到标签文本 nameLabel.setText("");//设置标签文本
    LovoList<T>
    列表框组件
    示例： public class ManBean { private int id; private String userName; private String sex; private Date birthday; …… public String toString(){ return this.userName; } } LovoList lovoList = new LovoList(400, 100, 100, 200,this); lovoList.setList(list); 添加点击选项事件 LovoList lovoList = new LovoList(400, 100, 100, 200,list,this){ public void onchange(ManBean t){ System.out.println(t.getUserName()); } };
    LovoPassWordTxt
    密码框组件
    示例：
    LovoPassWordTxt pwd = new LovoPassWordTxt("密码",50,200,this); String pwdTxt = pwd.getText();//得到密码
    LovoRadioButton
    一组单选钮组件
    示例：
    LovoRadioButton lr = new LovoRadioButton("性别",new String[]{"男","女"},50,50,this); String sex = lr.getItem();//得到选中项 lr.setItem("男");//设置选中项 添加事件 LovoRadioButton lr = new LovoRadioButton("性别",new String[]{"男","女"},50,50,this){ public void addListener(String itemName) { JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, itemName); } };
    LovoTable
    表格组件
    示例： public class ManBean { private int id; private String userName; private String sex; private Date birthday; private Bike bike; …… public String toString(){ return this.userName; } } public class Bike{ private String type; …… } 创建表格 LovoTable table = new LovoTable( this,new String[]{"姓名","生日","自行车"}, new String[]{"userName","birthday","bike.type"} //表头对应的属性名 ,"id");//主键名 //设置表格大小和位置 table.setSizeAndLocation(50, 50, 300, 100); //将集合的内容显示在表格 table.updateLovoTable(list); //得到选中行obj Object id = table.getKey(); //得到选中行主键的整型值 int id = table.getKeyByInt(); //得到选中行主键的整型值 int String = table.getKeyByString(); //删除选中行 table.removeRow(); //得到选中行第三列的内容 String name = table.getSelectColumn(2);
    LovoTitleLabel
    标题标签
    示例： LovoTitleLabel t = new LovoTitleLabel("员 工 管 理",this);
    LovoTitlePanel
    带标题边框的容器
    示例：
    LovoTitlePanel jp = new LovoTitlePanel("查询员工",400, 430, 320, 150,this);
    LovoTree
    树形组件
    示例：
    //创建树形菜单，参数为根节点LovoTreeNode LovoTree tree = new LovoTree(rootNode);
    LovoTreeNode
    树节点组件
    示例： //创建节点 LovoTreeNode parentNode = new LovoTreeNode("父节点"); LovoTreeNode childNode = new LovoTreeNode("子节点"); //父节点中加入子节点 parentNode.add(childNode); //添加树节点点击事件 LovoTreeNode node = new LovoTreeNode("节点"){ public void addListener(){ System.out.println("节点被点中"); } };
    LovoTxt
    带标题文本框组件
    示例：
    LovoTxt nameTxt = new LovoTxt("姓名",50,200,this); String name = nameTxt.getText();//得到文本框字符串
    LovoTxtArea
    带标题文本域组件
    示例：
    LovoTxtArea remarkTxt = new LovoTxtArea("备注",50,200,100,100,this); String name = remarkTxt.getText();//得到文本域字符串
